reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - FOMC minutes released May 22 revealed that multiple officials expressed a willingness to further tighten policy if inflation risks materialize, catching markets off guard with a more hawkish tone than Jerome Powell's post-meeting press conference.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released May 22 revealed that multiple officials expressed a willingness to further tighten policy if inflation risks materialize, catching markets off guard with a more hawkish tone than Jerome Powell's post-meeting press conference.
payload.market_impact: Bullish for USD and Treasury yields; Bearish for gold and dollar-denominated commodities as rate-cut expectations are pushed further into late 2024.
